description: Learn MSG Is Not Dangerous in one minute.

hook.text: 'No MSG' signs hang in restaurant windows worldwide. The fear is based on a racist myth, not science.

discovery.text: Decades of double-blind studies have found no consistent link between MSG and any negative health effects.
